events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store, but it doesn't fit me and I would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The case has been categorized under Refund based on the customer's request for money back due to sizing issues.
Assigning this refund request to the returns specialist team to handle the customer's concern promptly.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out to us. I'm here to help you with your refund request for the jacket you ordered.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket is unused and in its original packaging?
My order number is 4578291. Yes, the jacket is unworn and still in its original packaging, ready to be returned.
Thank you for the info. We will initiate your refund once we receive the returned jacket. I will email you the return shipping label shortly.
Thanks for the quick response and the return label. I appreciate the smooth refund process you are facilitating.
We have received your returned jacket and processed your refund. You should see the credited amount on your original payment method within 3-5 business days.
Just following up to ensure you received the refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with today.
Since your refund has been completed and no further issues were reported, we are closing this case. Thank you for your business!
